content:
Could I request a review on this. It has been open for awhile and is also discussed a bit on zulip
here: https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/287929-mathlib4/topic/Measurability.20modulo.20a.20sigma.20filter

I have a mostly complete project on Baire measurability which I think would be good to add to mathlib but depends on this PR.
I left some small style comments. The content looks good to me, but this is my first time reviewing, so I'm going to let a more experienced reviewer judge that.
